polis wishesha karya balakaye sebalun dedenekuta pereda (26) beruwala dinagoda pradeshaye di nandunana pirisak amanushika lesa pahara di athayi beruwala polisiya kiyayi.pahara kamata lak wu sebalun dedena beruwala dumriya sthanaya asala dama gos thibiya di jangama mura sancharaye yedemin siti polis niladharinta hamu wi atha.inpasu ema sebalun dedena beruwala rajaye rohalata athulath karana laduwa ethanin kaluthara nagoda maha rohalata marukara yawa thibe.gonahena polis wishesha karya balaka kandawure sewaya karana mema sebalun beruwala ambaepitiya pradeshaye pawathi awamangalyaya uthsawayakata sahabhagi wi aapasu niwes bala yamin sitiyadi mema praharayata lakwa athayi polisiya kiyayi.drawida bhashawen katha kala pirisak thamanta pahara dun bawa ema sebalun polisiyata prakasha kara atha.kaluthara kottasa bhara polis adhikari roshanda silwa mahathage upades matha beruwala polis sthanadhipathi polis parikshaka duminda rajapaksha mahathage meheyawima yatathe me pilibandawa wadidura parikshana pawathwe..
ebawin mowun wisin gena yanu labana asathyaprakasha walata norawatena lesa prajathanthrawadi shri lankiya janathawagen waidya rajitha senarathna mahatha illayi.

mahacharya keli bewarpod mahathmiya migahayaya gamata paminenne in anathuruwayi.game tharunayinge balaporoththuwalata nawa panak labune aya pamina shakthi samuhika sanwidhanaye niladharin muna gasunata pasuwayi.gamata labuna praja shalawakanadawe manitoba wishwa widyalaye gruha nirmana shilpaya ha udyana alankaranaya pilibanda wasara 04 ka patamalawak pawathwena athara, ‚Äòjathyanthara prajawa samanga wada karamin igena ganima‚Äô namathi wyapruthiya yatathe warshikawa sidukarana nila katayuththak wana lokaye diyunu wemin pawathina ratakata gos wishwa widyala sisun gamaka nawathi sitimin praja idikirimaka niratha wime awasthawa mewara migahayaya gamata laba diya haki bawa ehidi mahacharya keli mahathmiya gamata danwana ladi.adahagatha nohaki aashirwadayak se pamini mema swarnamaya awasthawen uparima prayojana ganimata ekanga wimata shakthi samuhika sanwidhanaya thiranaya karanne dewarak nositha.me kandayamata masayaka kalayakata awashya wisa laba dimata aagamana ha wigamana palaka adhyaksha janaral chulananda rathnayaka mahatha paudgalikawa madahath wi katayuthu karathibenawa.2011 mayi 10 wanida mahacharya keli mahathmiyath age sahayakayan lesa mark saha jems yana kathikacharya warun dedenath sisun 05 k saha sisuwiyan 05 lesa wiwidha jathinta ayath 13 denakugen yuth kanada kandayama migahayaya gamata paminiye in anathuruwayi.gammun wisin me kandayama unusum saha harasara lesa piligaththe game pipunu wana mal walin sadu mal mala damamin.

dedina nila sancharayakata dakunu saha madhyama aasiyanu katayuthu pilibanda amerika eksath janapada sahakara rajya lekam robat oo blek mahatha heta (12) shri lankawata pamineyi.shri lankawe wathman sanwardhana katayuthu menma anagatha salasum daka ganime aramunin meratata paminena ee mahatha labana 14 da thek shri lankawe randi sitina athara rajaye niyojithayan, wipakshaye deshapalana niyojithayan menma siwil sewakayan samanga sakachcha pawathwimata¬† balaporoththuwana bawa shri lankawe amerika eksath janapada thanapathi karyalaya pawasayi.wisheshayen ugath padam komisan warthawe nirdesha ka‡∑äriyawata nanwima sadaha shri lanka rajaya gena thibena kriyamarga sambandhayenda mehidi awadhanaya yomu kere.dakunu saha madhyama aasiyanu katayuthu pilibanda amerika eksath janapada sahakara rajya lekamwaraya awastha kihipayakadi shri lankawe sancharayakara thibena athara ehidi rate sanwardhanaya ha aarthika wardhanaya sandaha rajaya gena thibena wadapiliwela pilibandawa agaya kaleya.me sancharayedi uthure pradesha kihipayaka sancharaya kirimata niyamitha athara ee ee pradeshayanhi sanwardhanaya ha janathawage jiwanopaya ihala nanwima wenuwen rajaya gena thibena kriyamargaya daka ganimatada niyamithawa atha.
